articles.title: NeuroAiD has shown favourable outcome in patients suffering from spinal cord injuries - AsiaOne
articles.description: SATURN study aimed at assessing the safety and effects of a 6-month course of NeuroAiD (MLC601/MLC901) to augment functional and motor recovery after severe spinal cord injury (SCI). NeuroAiD was safe as add-on treatment in patients with severe SCI. One third…
articles.content: • SATURN study aimed at assessing the safety and effects of a 6-month course of NeuroAiD (MLC601/MLC901) to augment functional and motor recovery after severe spinal cord injury (SCI).
